ClipboardActionKoMultipleSelection: This action won't work on multiple selection
InconsistentNbColumnsPerRowsInClipboard: The clipboard data must have the same number of columns per rows
NbColumnsOfClipboardNotEqualToNbVisibleC: The clipboard data must have same number of columns than the selected nodes
GroupingUIPlaceholder: Drag here to set row groups

ContextualMenuBuilder.MaxFilterColumn: The maximum number of filters has been reached
ContextualMenuBuilder.SizeGroupToFit: Size Columns of Group to Fit

DataGridViewCustomViewsDialog.Title: Custom Views

RenameView.LongHelp: Click to rename the selected custom view

DeleteView.LongHelp: Click to delete the selected custom view
DeleteView.ConfirmationQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete the custom view

CreateView.LongHelp: Click to create a new custom view

UpdateFromCurrentView.Label: Update from Current View
UpdateFromCurrentView.ShortHelp: Update selected custom view from current view
UpdateFromCurrentView.LongHelp:
The selected custom view does not contain some changes made in the current view.
These differences are marked in orange.
Click to update the selected custom view from the current view changes

ApplyView.ViewSaved: The changes have been successfully saved in the custom view
ApplyView.ConfirmationQuestion: Do you want to apply these changes to the current view ?

DataGridViewCustomViewsDialog.ViewAlreadyExists: A custom view already exists for the name
DataGridViewCustomViewsDialog.Description: Change the columns properties of the selected view
DataGridViewCustomViewsDialog.GroupingPlaceholder: Drag here to set row groups

ModelMassUpdate.Title: Mass Update
ModelMassUpdate.Description: Choose the attributes you want to update on
